history.summary: MVP-Lite Day 3: Agents Page & Job Submission Flow completed with full integration
history.completion_message: Successfully completed Integration Day with all deliverables: /agents page with grid layout, complete job submission flow with real-time WebSocket updates, enhanced /results page with copy/share functionality, keyboard shortcuts, breadcrumbs navigation, and dashboard integration with real results. The complete user journey works end-to-end flawlessly from agent selection to result viewing. Enhanced with processing stages, connection status indicators, and mobile optimization.
deliverables_completed: /agents page with grid layout and agent pre-selection
Complete job submission flow with POST /api/jobs integration
Enhanced /results/[id] page with real-time WebSocket updates
Dashboard integration with real results from localStorage/API
Breadcrumbs navigation (Home > Process > Results)
Keyboard shortcuts (⌘+C copy, ⌘+Enter submit, Esc back)
Processing stages with animated progress indicators
Connection status indicators (WebSocket vs polling)
Copy to clipboard with enhanced fallback support
Share functionality with modal placeholder
Form persistence across sessions with smart clearing
Quick stats dashboard (total jobs, completed, avg time)
Enhanced mobile responsiveness across all pages
Comprehensive error handling and retry mechanisms
enhanced_features: WebSocket real-time updates with intelligent polling fallback
Processing stages indicator (Initializing → Analyzing → Extracting → Finalizing)
Enhanced animations with progress shine effects
Connection awareness showing real-time vs polling mode
Smart agent pre-selection retention across navigation
Quick stats with total/completed jobs and average processing time
Enhanced clipboard API with fallback for older browsers
Comprehensive keyboard shortcuts throughout the flow
Form state persistence with intelligent clearing
Real-time dashboard integration with refresh functionality

history.summary: MVP-Lite Day 2: Multi-Input Upload & Process Page completed with enhanced features
history.completion_message: Successfully built the core MVP feature - a complete /process page with multi-input support (File/URL/Text/Audio), intelligent agent selection, and enhanced UX. All deliverables completed with additional enhancements including API integration, mobile responsiveness, progress indicators, and state management ready for Day 3 integration.
deliverables_completed: /process page with exact layout and 4 input type tabs
AgentSelector component with radio buttons and smart filtering
FileUpload component with drag-drop and progress indicators
Complete input validation (file size, URL format, text limits)
Enhanced mobile responsive design with Tailwind CSS
API integration with graceful fallback to mock data
Process button with form validation and state storage
API status indicator and loading states
Enhanced animations and error handling
Day 3 integration preparation completed

history.summary: MVP-Lite Day 1: Foundation & Dashboard UI completed
history.completion_message: Successfully built dashboard UI with routing for 4 pages, navigation layout, welcome screen with CTAs, and recent results display. All responsive breakpoints tested. Ready for Day 2.
deliverables_completed: Next.js routing for /, /process, /agents, /results/[id]
Layout component with sidebar navigation
Dashboard with welcome message and process/agents CTAs
ResultCard component for recent results
Shared UI components (Button, Card, LoadingSpinner, ErrorMessage)
Mobile responsive design with bottom navigation

history.summary: UI Components Audit and API Requirements Definition completed for Sprint 4 Integration
history.completion_message: Successfully completed comprehensive audit of all AIOS v2 UI components and defined complete API requirements. Delivered updated OpenAPI specification, WebSocket events documentation, and UI-backend mapping covering file processing, agent management, knowledge repository, analytics, and DAG operations. Ready for backend API implementation in Week 2.
deliverables_completed: /docs/api/openapi.yaml - Complete AIOS v2 API specification with 25+ endpoints
/docs/api/websocket-events.md - Comprehensive real-time events documentation
/docs/api/ui-backend-mapping.md - Detailed component-to-API mapping
Identified 5 missing API methods in existing client implementation
Documented cross-component integration patterns and performance optimizations

Successfully completed comprehensive repository cleanup with 28 files archived, 3 phase directories moved, 35+ empty directories cleaned, and 4 new documentation categories created. Repository is now production-ready with clean structure and complete traceability.
